info.title: SME ERP API
info.description: Enterprise Resource Planning for Small and Medium Enterprises

get.description:
Basic health check endpoint.
Returns 200 if service is alive.
Used by load balancers for basic routing.

Readiness check endpoint.
Returns 200 only if service can handle requests.
Checks all critical dependencies.
Used by Kubernetes readinessProbe.

schema.title: Response Readiness Check Health Ready Get

get.description:
Liveness check endpoint.
Returns 200 if service should not be restarted.
Used by Kubernetes livenessProbe.
Should be very lightweight and rarely fail.

schema.title: Response Liveness Check Health Live Get

get.description:
Startup check endpoint.
Returns 200 when service has finished starting up.
Used by Kubernetes startupProbe.

schema.title: Response Startup Check Health Startup Get

get.description:
Basic operational metrics.
Returns key performance indicators.

schema.title: Response Basic Metrics Health Metrics Get

get.description:
Phase 9: Validates stateless architecture for horizontal scaling.
Confirms app is ready for load balancer deployment.

schema.title: Response Stateless Validation Health Stateless Get

get.description:
Phase 9: Comprehensive scaling readiness validation.
Checks all prerequisites for multi-instance deployment.

schema.title: Response Scaling Readiness Health Scaling Get

get.description:
Ultra-lightweight endpoint for load balancer health checks.
Optimized for high-frequency polling.

schema.title: Response Load Balancer Health Health Lb Get

post.description: Login and get access token. OAuth2 compatible for Swagger.
Refresh access token using refresh token.

get.description: Get current user profile.

List users with optional filtering (ADMIN+ required)
- Filter by role and/or active status
- Pagination support

schema.title: Response List Users Api V1 Users Users Get

post.description:
Create new user (ADMIN+ required)
- Only SUPER_ADMIN can create ADMIN or SUPER_ADMIN users
- Email must be unique
- Auto-activate user

get.description: Get user by ID (ADMIN+ required)

put.description:
Update user (ADMIN+ required)
- Only SUPER_ADMIN can modify ADMIN+ users or assign ADMIN+ roles
- Email uniqueness enforced
- Prevent privilege escalation

delete.description:
Disable user (soft delete) (ADMIN+ required)
- Only SUPER_ADMIN can disable ADMIN+ users
- Cannot disable yourself (safety protection)
- Soft delete only (is_active = False)

post.description:
Reset user password (SUPER_ADMIN only)
- Security-sensitive operation requires highest privileges
- Password strength validation
- Cannot reset your own password via this endpoint

schema.title: Response Reset User Password Api V1 Users Users  User Id  Reset Password Post

get.description: List available roles with descriptions (ADMIN+ required)

schema.title: Response List Roles Api V1 Users Roles Get

get.description: Get current user information

post.description:
Assign/change user role (ADMIN+ required)
- ADMIN can only change VIEWER ↔ STAFF  
- SUPER_ADMIN can change any role
- Cannot change own role (safety protection)
- Audit logged with before/after values
Create new inventory item. Requires ADMIN role or higher.

get.description: List inventory items. Requires VIEWER role or higher.

schema.title: Response List Items Api V1 Inventory Items Get

get.description: Get item by ID. Requires VIEWER role or higher.

put.description: Update item. Requires ADMIN role or higher.

delete.description: Soft delete item. Requires ADMIN role or higher.

schema.title: Response Delete Item Api V1 Inventory Items  Item Id  Delete

post.description: Create new location. Requires ADMIN role or higher.

get.description: List locations. Requires VIEWER role or higher.

schema.title: Response List Locations Api V1 Inventory Locations Get

get.description: Get location by ID. Requires VIEWER role or higher.

put.description: Update location. Requires ADMIN role or higher.

delete.description: Soft delete location. Requires ADMIN role or higher.

schema.title: Response Delete Location Api V1 Inventory Locations  Location Id  Delete

post.description: Record stock IN transaction. Requires STAFF role or higher.
Record stock OUT transaction. Requires STAFF role or higher.
Record stock TRANSFER transaction. Requires STAFF role or higher.

schema.title: Response Stock Transfer Api V1 Inventory Stock Transfer Post

post.description: Record stock ADJUSTMENT transaction. Requires ADMIN role or higher.

get.description: Get stock ledger entries. Requires VIEWER role or higher.

schema.title: Response Get Stock Ledger Api V1 Inventory Stock Ledger Get

get.description: Get current stock levels (derived from ledger). Requires VIEWER role or higher.

schema.title: Response Get Current Stock Api V1 Inventory Stock Current Get

get.description: Get audit logs for inventory actions. Requires ADMIN role or higher.

schema.title: Response Get Audit Logs Api V1 Inventory Audit Get

get.description:
Get current inventory snapshot with filtering and pagination.
Requires VIEWER role or higher.

This endpoint provides a comprehensive view of current stock levels across all locations.

schema.title: Response Get Inventory Snapshot Api V1 Inventory Reports Snapshot Get

get.description:
Get stock movement history with comprehensive filtering.
Requires VIEWER role or higher.

Provides detailed audit trail of all inventory movements.

schema.title: Response Get Stock Movements Api V1 Inventory Reports Movements Get

get.description:
Export inventory snapshot to CSV format.
Requires ADMIN role or higher.

WARNING: This endpoint can generate large files. Use filters to limit data size.

Export stock movement history to CSV format.
Requires ADMIN role or higher.

WARNING: This endpoint can generate very large files. Use date range filters.

Get high-level inventory summary statistics.
Requires VIEWER role or higher.

Provides key metrics for dashboard and reporting.

schema.title: Response Get Inventory Summary Api V1 Inventory Reports Summary Get

get.description: Test endpoint to register OAuth2 scheme with FastAPI.

CurrentStockOut.title: CurrentStockOut
CurrentStockOut.description: Current stock summary by item and location
